mapper.sql: payment_id, person_id, security_type_id, security_item_code, security_type_category, operate_time, start_time, end_time, org_fee, personal_fee, org_late_fee, personal_late_fee, description, create_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into ehr_supplement_payment (payment_id, person_id, security_type_id, security_item_code, security_type_category, operate_time, start_time, end_time, org_fee, personal_fee, org_late_fee, personal_late_fee, description, create_time, is_deleted) values (#{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{securityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{securityItemCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{securityTypeCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgLateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personalLateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ehr_supplement_payment
payment_id,
person_id,
security_type_id,

operate_time,
start_time,
end_time,

personal_fee,

is_deleted,
#{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{securityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{securityItemCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{securityTypeCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update ehr_supplement_payment
person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
security_type_id = #{securityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
security_item_code = #{securityItemCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
security_type_category = #{securityTypeCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_fee = #{orgFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
personal_fee = #{personalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
org_late_fee = #{orgLateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
personal_late_fee = #{personalLateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}

update ehr_supplement_payment set person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, security_type_id = #{securityTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, security_item_code = #{securityItemCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, security_type_category = #{securityTypeCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_fee = #{orgFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, personal_fee = #{personalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, org_late_fee = #{orgLateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, personal_late_fee = #{personalLateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sp.* FROM ehr_supplement_payment sp LEFT JOIN ehr_person_security_profile psf ON sp.person_id=psf.personId LEFT JOIN ehr_security_item si ON si.security_profile_id=psf.profile_id WHERE si.security_type_category=#{type} AND psf.profile_id=#{profileId} AND sp.operate_time=#{month} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("sp.person_id")}
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ehr_supplement_payment WHERE person_id=#{personId} and operate_time=#{month} and is_deleted = 0
